name: CQ.Ext.grid.TemplateColumn
doc:

data using a configured ...

configs.doc: Optional. Set the CSS text-align property of the column. Defaults to undefined.

configs.name: fixed
configs.doc: Optional. true if the column width cannot be changed. Defaults to false.

configs.doc: Optional. true to disable the column menu. Defaults to false.

configs.doc: Optional. false to disable column resizing. Defaults to true.

props.name: renderer
props.doc:
Optional. A function which returns displayable data when passed the following parameters:

value ...

methods.name: getCellEditor
methods.doc:
Returns the editor defined for this column that was created to wrap the Field
used to edit the cell.

methods.name: setEditor
methods.doc: Sets a new editor for this column.

events.name: click
events.doc: Fires when this Column is clicked.

events.name: contextmenu
events.doc: Fires when this Column is right clicked.

events.name: dblclick
events.doc: Fires when this Column is double clicked.

events.name: mousedown
events.doc: Fires when this Column receives a mousedown event.
